SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="a93d68d83d95488a8cb641add4f9c3e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Sai, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal01"/]Collin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] l'addetto alle comunicazioni?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]

SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_03:

SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="5f655e61da37466ab73e7805a0ff97a7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Quando combatto, vado subito dritto

SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="7e34e6a5b88b4360bd8d05e349eaf5c9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Hai indagato un bel po'.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Comunque,

SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="4c37fdeac1b84b50ad74debfdccb8818" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Quando si diventa ranger esperti come me,

SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="530c920b456041d6b06f5eff84190e65" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Anche se conta membri eccezionali come

compriamo hanno un costo astronomico!
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="b317948026da4b0f9ceca2d65149fd68" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Probabilmente hai già conosciuto [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Normal03"/]Russ[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],

Mi fa venire mal di testa.
SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_02_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="ac8eb06c0ffa4250a1e1f51c55c93613" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Ci sono alcune cose che semplicemente

SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_00:

[System:Color name="NoVoice" ]Ah però... [etc:Wait frame="8"/]mica male.[System:Color name="Default"][System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="51e758371067450aa7a059a277005f67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Beh, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]è ancora troppo presto per mettersi

SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_01:

SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="f5b8a0a712ee464fa485546ea4b0438d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Sad"/]Quand'ero piccolo, vivevo in una casa

SV008.SV008_Area500_Talk_Quest_Hint_03_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal06"/][UE:Meta key="b024d865391345b5b8dd62db4e99f6d8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]L'addetto alle comunicazioni è un...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
